snippet: The Dr Pepper ads are reminiscent of the famous "Be a Pepper" commercials but with a postmodern twist.
abstract: The Dr Pepper ads are reminiscent of the famous "Be a Pepper" commercials but with a postmodern twist.
lead_paragraph: The soft-drink category is one of the most competitive in marketing, and the major players in the industry are wasting no time in wooing consumers in the new year.

headline.main: Diet Pepsi and Dr Pepper Roll Out Aggressive New Campaigns
